mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( orderId, `order`.userId, `order`.addressId, orderStatus, orderAmount ) VALUES (#{orderId},#{userId},#{addressId},#{orderStatus},#{orderAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT commodity.commodityPicture, commodity.commodityTitle, commodity.commodityPrice, suborder.amount, commodity.commodityPrice * suborder.amount AS totalPrice, `order`.orderAmount FROM `order`, suborder, commodity WHERE `order`.orderId = suborder.orderId AND commodity.commodityId = suborder.commodityId AND `order`.orderId = #{orderId}

SELECT `order`.orderId, `order`.orderStatus, address.location, address.receiverName, address.receiverPhone FROM `order`, address WHERE `order`.addressId = address.addressId AND `order`.orderId = #{orderId}
